ValidationRule.description: AIN Survey Recipient or ProPilot Recipient is required if Contact Name is selected
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(NOT(ISBLANK(Contact_Name__c)), AIN_Survey_Recipient__c = FALSE, ProPilot_Recipient__c = FALSE) && $Profile.Name != 'System Administrator' && $Profile.Name != 'DeniedPartyScreeningAPIUser' && $Profile.Name != 'API DATA LOAD' && $Profile.Name !='Portal API User RO Automation' && $Profile.Name !='Portal API User - RFQ' && $Profile.Name !='Portal API User - Self-Registration' && $Profile.Name !='Portal Interfaces App User' && $Profile.Name !='Portal User - Self-Registration' && $Profile.Name !='Portal API User - Self-Registration (US)' && $Profile.Name !='Portal Hon Adminstrator' && $Profile.Name !='Portal API User - MCORE' && $User.Id !='005300000042rPL' && $User.Id != '005a0000007vvzm' && $User.Id !='005300000041m9d'
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please select either AIN Survey Recipient or ProPilot Recipient if Contact is selected
